segments.text: Welcome to Lincoln Bank . Are you a new customer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I am . I opened an account with you about a month ago , but today I'm here to see about a loan of some kind .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . As you don't have a long history with us , we will have to check your credit rating with your previous bank before we can promise any loan to you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , that's fine . My credit is good ; I banked at my former bank for many years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I ask why you decided to switch your account to us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Haha ! Actually , I felt that your array of services is much better than what my old bank had on offer . Plus , I've got plenty of friends who bank with you and they are extremely happy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We always welcome new business . If you can give me the details of your former bank , including your account number we can begin .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have everything right here . I'll let you go through that and come back . I'd like to have a good read of your materials to make sure I make the right choice .
segments.speaker: S2
